ing: 1 (32 fluid ounce) bottle lemon-lime sports drink
1 (32 fluid ounce) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "It is green and spooky. You use green sports drink and lemon-lime soda to make it and then you serve it with ice cubes."
ins: In a punch bowl combine the sports drink and the lemon-lime soda. Stir gently and serve over ice.
